description_txt: stated on October 31, 2013 in a news release:
quote_txt: Goodwill Industries International pays workers with disabilities wages as low as pennies per  hour.

description_txt: stated on December 9, 2013 in various Internet postings:
quote_txt: "By using a little-known loophole ... Obama minions are allowing Nestle Company to export precious fresh water out of Lake Michigan."

description_txt: stated on December 12, 2013 in an interview on MSNBC's "The Cycle":
quote_txt: "About 40 percent of workers don’t ... have a single paid sick day."

description_txt: stated on October 24, 2013 in an initial brief to the Florida Supreme Court:
quote_txt: Florida’s proposed medical marijuana amendment "would make Florida one of the most lenient medical-marijuana states, allowing use for limitless ‘other conditions’ specified by any physician."

description_txt: stated on October 24, 2013 in an initial brief to the Florida Supreme Court:
quote_txt: "Whether the Amendment passes or not, the medical use of marijuana is a federal criminal offense."

description_txt: stated on November 27, 2013 in a statement.:
quote_txt: "Of the four statewide races this century within a 300-vote margin, three have been overturned in a recount."

description_txt: stated on December 9, 2013 in a website:
quote_txt: Says "Harry Reid has a better voting attendance record than these three Congressmen!"

description_txt: stated on December 10, 2013 in a broadcast of "Focal Point":
quote_txt: "By the word religion in the First Amendment, the founders meant Christianity."

description_txt: stated on December 6, 2013 in a fundraising email:
quote_txt: The Employment Non-Discrimination Act "discriminates against Christian daycare, Christian parents, Christian business owners, and the rights of religious freedom."

description_txt: stated on December 9, 2013 in comments at a forum at the Center for Strategic and International Studies:
quote_txt: Iran President Hassan "Rouhani has more Cabinet members with Ph.D.s from American universities" than members of Barack Obama’s Cabinet.

description_txt: stated on December 7, 2013 in viral posts on the Internet:
quote_txt: School children can earn higher grades by studying Islam under a new "nationwide Muslim outreach program" announced by President Barack Obama.

description_txt: stated on December 13, 2013 in a campaign web page:
quote_txt: Says he would have "almost twice the actual experience practicing law" Greg Abbott did on becoming attorney general of Texas.

description_txt: stated on November 22, 2013 in a flier:
quote_txt: The new Atlanta Braves stadium will require no tax increase for homeowners and provide $3 million annually for Cobb County schools.

description_txt: stated on December 15, 2013 in in comments on Fox's "Fox News Sunday":
quote_txt: A gun "background check is futile. Something like 42 (people during the) last year … were prosecuted for trying to buy a gun with a criminal record out of 11 million."

description_txt: stated on December 15, 2013 in comments on ABC's "This Week":
quote_txt: "Every major city which has a center of poverty is run by Democrats. Every major city."

description_txt: stated on December 5, 2013 in an interview:
quote_txt: Under President Obama’s health-care reforms, the premium for "an average plan for a family didn't go down by $2,500 per year, it's gone up about $2,500 per year."

description_txt: stated on December 3, 2013 in a radio interview:
quote_txt: "The vast, overwhelming majority of [crimes that occur with a firearm] are committed by people who don’t legally possess that firearm in the first place."
footer: By C. Eugene Emery Jr. • December 15, 2013

description_txt: stated on December 9, 2013 in a paper for the Oregon Business Plan:
quote_txt: "Oregon leads the nation in number of jobs per capita in manufacturing."

quote_txt: Says Rep. Steve Stockman "basically wants gun-filled zones in schools."

description_txt: stated on November 17, 2013:
quote_txt: "The Earth is not warming."

quote_txt: The town of Cumberland has "its highest bond rating in history."
